definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: cyrus (Pers. K’ur’u(š), Spieg:APK 215; Bab. Kuraš COT on Ezr 1:1, Dl in Baer:Dn. p. x)—king of (Anzan = Susiana, Tiele:Bab.-Assyr. Gesch. 469, and) Persia, conqueror of Babylon (Tiele:ib. 468 ff.), restorer of Jews to Palestine Is 44:28, Is 45:1, Ezr 1:7; called [[מֶלֶךְ]] [[פָּרַם]] 2Ch 36:22, 2Ch 36:22, 2Ch 36:23, Ezr 1:1, Ezr 1:1, Ezr 1:2, also Ezr 1:8, Ezr 4:3, Ezr 4:5, Da 10:1; simply [[הֵמֶּלֶח]] Da 1:21.
